remarks: Cancellation law for a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsubadd.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvnpcan $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A M B ) G B ) = A ) $.
